reporter_caption.center: NORMAN v. DEPT. OF TRANS., 358 N.C. 545 (2004)

caption.center: SUSAN NORMAN v. NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 20th day of April 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of June 2004.
